tweets.text: Woken to blocked nose, wheezy chest, sticky eyes. Am I sick ? Yes, sick to death of @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids  @PHE_WestMids allowing this suffering and more. The Walleys Landfill is a 3rd world  health/ env emergency @DrMariaNeira @WHO @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink

They don’t think the problem is from there they have never dealt with this before, how can you expect them to sort it, help them out help us out @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @pow_rebecca @MattHancock @BorisJohnson @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink https://t.co/sz6y6uLih0

Do something @EnvAgencyMids Stop @RedIndustries2 accepting waste, cap it off @WalleysL  landfill. Monitor. #StopTheStink Do something. Stop letting Red gas the residents of Newcastle Under Lyme.

@EleanorO16 @EnvAgency @RishiSunak @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock Though also, they need to fund the EA properly in the long term, so that they can do proper monitoring of other sites, and no-one is ever in this situation again.

This This This This. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @MPGeorgeEustice @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/VdWPItr9x3

tweets.text: Good God Almighty, @WHO on earth @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids would sanction this ? What inhumane rush for money is this all about? Just a couple of years difference. @JuliaBradbury @DrMariaNeira @ShaunLintern @JournoJess_ @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe https://t.co/UBOWZ4zDek

Greenhouse Political Insights is out!

This week: 
🐿️ #EnvironmentBill continues through Parliament
📉 @EnvAgency publishes #NetZeroRoadmap

More 👇
https://t.co/QaVaiJBJgO https://t.co/ZJ7duy7YJI

@JamesA_1234 @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids 5 am for us,always starts with stingy eyes before the stench, sleep deprivation is torture, the stench is suffocating, all we can taste is bad eggs , 2 hours in tonight, no chance of sleep #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids you currently assess H2S from against annoyance (30 min avg 7ug/m3) and health (24hr avg 150ug/m3), what are the effects of several hundred ug/m3 for 12 hours day after day? This is our nightly reality. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL
@stouty26 @RdgHydro @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency https://t.co/5qUTI8w4tt

@EnvAgency say they won’t drill inside & cause any more exposure. Whilst this makes sense it does allow @RedIndustries2 to get off scot free if hazardous materials have indeed been tipped there. I say go for it @ClareDinnisEA - warn us first & we’ll get out of town #stopthestink https://t.co/MTQUMQlNBu

Getting ever closer 👍😄 @RdgHydro #Reading #Berkshire #hydropower #RiverThames #Caversham #Cavershamweir #readinghydro @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency #communityenergy #volunteering #Sustainability https://t.co/JY7tMtzNbv

tweets.text: @ollyandpatch @EnvAgencyMids Would you won’t this on your door step? We don’t do the right thing close it down and sort the toxic gas problem yourself @RedIndustries2 don’t know how to #StopTheStink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids So how will this work @ClareDinnisEA? You talk down the phone at us for 20 minutes then a select few get to ask a question? Why not zoom? Better still we are organising our own community meeting, why not just come and speak to the people in person?

@EnvAgencyMids Oh look 👀 how many other landfills across the country are you doing this with? How many posts like this do other landfills have on a EA Twitter feed 🤔🧐🧐 OH LOOK none!! WHY?? Because there is a major incident at this site. Breach breach breach breach!!! Poisonous sky!!! 🆘🆘🆘

urls.title: Defra must strongly consider if WHO guidelines are right to measure odour from landfill sites
urls.description: Landfill sites are an important part of our waste management process, but smells from landfill waste are having a significant impact on the quality of life of local residents, writes Aaron Bell MP.

tweets.text: It is concerning that @EnvAgency say that closing the site would carry risks regarding ongoing management. Suggests that @DefraGovUK will not take responsibility for the health of UK citizens, poisoned by a landfill imposed on them by central government https://t.co/Rbqi8t9M43 https://t.co/SS7bjTPaya

So, @EnvAgency can’t legally suspend operations at the toxic @RedIndustries2 landfill because it’s not the new waste that’s the problem (yet). But they have also reported 10 permit breaches this year https://t.co/XClLWJugXR, so surely that’s grounds for suspension? #stopthestink https://t.co/RD6b3Hg0jX https://t.co/6YcmBzhhQx

urls.title: ‘It’s terrifying’: the English village overwhelmed by landfill stink
urls.description: For miles around Walleys Quarry near Newcastle-under-Lyme, people have reported waking up in the night struggling to breathe
